private_key_files.hint: Upload one or more GitHub App private key files. The first valid PEM will be used.

default_github_events.hint: Used when platform-level github_events is empty. Empty means subscribe all supported events.

default_wake_event_types.hint: Used when platform-level wake_event_types is empty.

default_wake_on_mentions.hint: Used when platform-level wake_on_mentions is not explicitly set.

default_mention_target_logins.hint: Wake only when @login matches one of these values.

default_ignore_bot_sender_events.hint: Ignore webhook events where sender.type is Bot.

delivery_cache_ttl_seconds.hint: Dedup cache lifetime used for replay protection.

delivery_cache_max_entries.hint: Upper limit of in-memory dedup cache entries.

auto_create_github_skill.description: Auto create GitHub skill on plugin load
auto_create_github_skill.hint: Create or update SKILL.md under data/skills and activate it.

github_skill_name.hint: Directory name under data/skills. Recommended: letters, numbers, dot, underscore, hyphen.

overwrite_github_skill.hint: When enabled, plugin load will overwrite SKILL.md to keep docs aligned with code.

enable_direct_repo_write_tool.hint: When enabled, github_create_license_pr can create branch/commit/PR without exposing token to LLM.

enable_auto_sandbox_workspace_prepare.description: Auto prepare sandbox workspace for GitHub session shell
enable_auto_sandbox_workspace_prepare.hint: When enabled, shell calls in GitHub sessions auto-enter a session workspace and auto-clone repo if missing.

sandbox_workspace_root.hint: Root directory used for session workspaces inside sandbox.

sandbox_workspace_clone_depth.hint: Depth for initial auto clone when workspace repository is missing.

enforce_tool_write_guard.hint: Only blocks plain ghs_... token literals in tool arguments. It does not restrict local git/shell behavior.

guard_block_token_literal.hint: When guard is enabled, block shell/python calls containing plain ghs_... token literals.
